ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT( ISBLANK( Approval_Date__c ) ), ISPICKVAL(Premium_Pay_Status__c,'Cancelled' ), DATE( YEAR(Approval_Date__c) + 1, MONTH(Approval_Date__c) , DAY(Approval_Date__c) ) < TODAY() )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: A Time Record can not be cancelled a year pass the Approval Date.
